spell1.name: MYSTICAL MISSILE
spell1.description: Fire Mystical Missiles to heal allies or deal damage to enemies

attributes.label: ABILITY TYPE
attributes.value: Single-cast projectile with delayed impact that also generates a spell field

attributes.label: DAMAGE
attributes.value: The projectile deals no damage, while the spell field inflicts 30 damage per cast

attributes.label: HEALING
attributes.value: The projectile does not provide healing, but the spell field provides 40 Health per cast

attributes.label: DAMAGE FALLOFF
attributes.value: Falloff begins at 0.5m, decreasing to 50% at 2.5m

spell2.name: GOD OF MISCHIEF
spell2.description: Shapeshift into a targeted ally or enemy hero and use all their abilities except any of their Team-Up Abilities.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: After transforming, Loki's Ultimate ability will be fully charged. Casting a transformation-type Ultimate ability will extend the duration of Devious Exchange until the transformation ability ends.

spell3.name: REGENERATION DOMAIN
spell3.description: Use Rune Stones to create a magical field that provides allies Healing and converts incoming damage into further healing.

attributes.label: ABILITY TYPE
attributes.value: Release a spell field at the location of Loki and the Illusion

attributes.label: RANGE
attributes.value: A cylindrical spell field with a radius of 5m and a height of 2m

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: The spell field is sustained by Rune Stones. It will disappear if the Rune Stone is destroyed or if its maximum duration is reached. Allies within the field will receive healing over time, and any damage taken will be converted into healing based on the amount of damage taken

spell4.name: DOPPELGANGER
spell4.description: Project an Illusion that can cast some of Loki's abilities.

spell6.name: BACKSTAB
spell6.description: Pull out a dagger to stab enemies, dealing extra damage when attacking an enemy from behind

spell7.name: DECEPTION
spell7.description: Become Invisible and conjure an Illusion to deceive enemies.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Loki leaves an illusion in his place and becomes invisible while continuously healing himself. This invisibility has no time limit, but any actions other than casting Devious Exchange, reloading, or casting Doppelganger will render him visible
